Text: Thank you from the kids and their Pingu-loving mom.

The title and the description of this one is misleading. It is not Pingu Forever, and it is definitely not 24 of the classic stop motion-animated episodes.

This is a DVD with 7 of the newly produced computer-animated Pingu episodes. 

Look here instead for the real Pingu Forever:
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3233287
